title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Best Practices for moving, innovating & extending SAP Cloud ERP (COP209)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - SAP Cloud ERP 迁移、创新和扩展最佳实践 (COP209)
abstract: SAP will share their best practices for moving to SAP Cloud ERP and SAP Business Suite with the Integrated Toolchain.  Hear best practices around transformation to reach a persistent innovative state while keeping the core clean SAP Cloud ERP, Business Suite and SAP Business Technology Platform.  Also hear real-world success stories from AWS and SAP customers. This presentation is brought to you by SAP, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: SAP将分享他们迁移到SAP Cloud ERP和SAP Business Suite与集成工具链的最佳实践。了解围绕转型以达到持续创新状态同时保持核心清洁的SAP Cloud ERP、Business Suite和SAP Business Technology Platform的最佳实践。还将听到来自AWS和SAP客户的真实成功案例。本演示由AWS合作伙伴SAP为您呈现。

presenter.name: Steve Van Wyk
presenter.title: Global Head of Technology & Innovation for RISE
